name: The Last December Demo
description:
The Last December is about an 18 year old girl with lung problems, who found out she doesn't have much time left to live. Tired of the treatments and medicines that didn't help save her despite having spent a large part of her life staying in the hospital, she decides to escape the hospital to fulfil her bucket list with the help of a boy who broke his arm in a recent car crash and  a mysterious new guy, who is unwilling to reveal much about himself to the other two. Together, they will help the girl fulfil her dying wishes, which includes some things like riding a motorbike, watching the sunrise, having her first kiss and visiting the amazing town of Cornucopia.

The Last December Demo 0.1 (05.04.2017)
This is just a VERY short mini demo of the game, with incomplete artworks and limited choices. Just for players to get a rough idea of how it's going to be like :)

The Last December Demo 0.1.1 (19.04.2017)
Still a VERY short mini demo of the game, with incomplete artworks and limited choices. Fixed the transitions bug, added sound effects, removed manual save and manual load page, changed it to auto save and auto load.

The Last December Demo 0.1.2 (05.05.2017)
Still a VERY short mini demo of the game, with incomplete artworks and limited choices. Fixed the history page bug, brushed up on auto save and auto load feature.

The Last December Demo 0.2 (16.05.2017)
An updated mini demo of the game. New user interface design, with more features and longer playtime!
